@flandertje, let's see if I understand you correctly - you are trying to play this online on the EA-Games network without actually paying for the title? You do realize that there are protections in place to keep this from happening... I mean, if you could get a torrent hack of a game and play it on their servers, do you really think anyone would buy the software?

I'm trying really hard to not get all douchbag here and start screaming about what a moronic thing this is to admit to trying to do, but I'm losing the battle in my head. How can you really expect to play a game online that you didn't pay for? Be happy with single player, or go out and buy it. It's that easy. 

I swear to God, some of the people on here, I really have to wonder how they manage to turn the power on for their rigs. Use your head, really... You want to update the game, find an updated hack. You want to play online, hook up to a lan. You want to play multiplayer on the EA servers with the most current content patches as they are made available? Pay for the game.

It's so easy, why do so few understand the whole concept of TPB. Helloooo... Pirate..... 

/palmface

good luck flandertje.
